mapper.select: SELECT id, activity_name as activityName, topics_1 as topics1, topics_2 as topics2, topics_3 as topics3, begin_time as beginTime, end_time as endTime, official, community_name as communityName, vote_num as voteNum, vote_scope as voteScope, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM activity ORDER BY create_time DESC
